channel.title: Validating updates on AWS Quick Start Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Validating updates on AWS Quick Start Workshop

item.title: Validating CI/CD pipeline
item.description: Deployment options Once the Forge-App-CICD stack reaches CREATE_COMPLETE status, go to the CodePipelineURL in the Outputs section. The CodePipeline will sequentially execute each of the stages: Source, Test build, Git merge, Sync to S3, Prod we had talked about earlier. While the Test build stage is in progress, you can go to CloudFormation console in US West (N. California) Region to verify a test stack is being created.

item.title: Validating code update
item.description: After you have approved the change, the CodePipeline will execute the ChangeSet. Go to the CloudFormation console, you should see Forge-Prod-Stack being updated. In about 5 minutes, the stack will reach UPDATE_COMPLETE status. Go to the ForgeAppURL again and verify that your application now shows a dashboard for your models. (Tested in Chrome browser)
